title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, even if the key is left blank, it should still have a valid value. The expected result is that the text is successfully externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the properties file 
2. Leave the key blank 
3. Save and view the chart title. The externalized text should not be displayed.
